entries.title: Spotify Sleep Playlists Include Some Surprisingly Upbeat Music
entries.description: Researchers analyzed Spotify sleep playlists to find out what kind of music makes people fall asleep. While ambient music was a popular choice, some of the tracks on these playlists were surprisingly upbeat.

entries.title: Seeking Medical Advice From TikTok? This Doctor Has Some Advice For You
entries.description: When you’re feeling sick, there’s a new place to look for medical advice.

entries.title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Better
entries.description: There are better options than Apple's all-out approach to performance in the new MacBook Pro laptops...

entries.title: USCIS Settles Lawsuit That Should Help H-1B And L-1 Visa Spouses
entries.description: The legal settlement will overturn a Trump policy that critics believe was designed to prevent H-1B spouses from working.

entries.title: New iPhone 16 Pro Leak Reveals iPhone 15 Pro Disappointment
entries.description: A long-awaited feature is finally expected to arrive in Apple’s flagship iPhone this year, but fans of smaller phones will have to wait considerably longer.

entries.title: Google Unlocks Surprise New Feature For Pixel 7 Pro
entries.description: It's time to turn on some new Pixel options.

entries.title: The Whole World In Your Hand: Major Advances In Haptic Technology
entries.description: Researchers developed a new haptic technology called WeTac that allows users to feel life-like sensations in their hands during virtual reality simulations.

entries.title: Netflix’s ‘That ‘90s Show’ Is Surprisingly Worth Your Time
entries.description: I have been deeply skeptical of Netflix’s comedic ambitions ever since I watched the first five minutes of Blockbuster, which I fear have scarred me for life. I had similar trepidations about That ‘90s Show, which on the surface, felt like an ill-conceived cash-in

entries.title: ‘Warrior Nun’ Fans Demanding Season 3 Buy Billboard Across From Netflix Office
entries.description: I have dealt with a lot of fandoms in my time, but few have impressed me as much as those attempting to save Warrior Nun after its season 2 cancellation at Netflix, angling for season 3 and beyond to continue its story.

entries.title: The One ‘Destiny 2’ Weapon You Should Farm For Lightfall
entries.description: While there are plenty of sandbox changes still to be announced as Destiny 2 readies its next expansion, Lightfall, the recent revelation about how armor and buildcrafting are changing has given us a way forward in some areas all the same.

entries.title: A Psychologist Teaches Us How To Fearlessly Step Outside Of Our Comfort Zone
entries.description: Are you struggling to find your next level? Here are two steps to make the process easier.

entries.title: Salmonella Outbreak Linked To Pet Bearded Dragons Has Spanned 20 States, CDC Says
entries.description: The Salmonella outbreak has already left at least 32 people sick and 10 people hospitalized.

entries.title: Some Good News About 'Ginny And Georgia' Season 3
entries.description: Ginny and Georgia fans have been biting their nails, waiting for some good news about Netflix renewing the show for season 3.

entries.title: ‘Marvel’s Avengers’ Is Going The Way Of ‘Anthem,’ Will Cease Development
entries.description: All of this, frankly, has lasted a lot longer than most would have predicted, given that Marvel’s Avengers was not exactly considered a great success, especially by its parent company Square Enix, who seemed to relish bringing up that fact at every turn.

entries.title: Current Climate: Tipping Points To Net Zero,  Smarter Train Tracks And Greenland’s Accelerating Melt
entries.description: This week’s Current Climate, which every Saturday brings you the latest news about the business of sustainability.

entries.title: Instagram Has Just Launched A Killer New Feature: Quiet Mode
entries.description: If you find social media overwhelming sometimes, this could be a great benefit.

entries.title: Selling Artificial Intelligence To The Business: Keep It Clear, Keep It Simple
entries.description: “Explainability trumps model performance, and the hottest solution doesn’t always win, especially if it’s too much of a black box.”

entries.title: No, PayPal Hasn’t Been Hacked: Yet Almost 35,000 Accounts Were Breached
entries.description: Hackers ‘brute-slammed’ PayPal accounts over three days to gain customer data access.

entries.title: Germany Must Supply Leopard Tanks To Ukraine
entries.description: Germany is experiencing a geopolitical crisis - the indecision of its Chancellor is embarrassing and will have long term consequences.

entries.title: ‘Mind Games’ Documentary Shows That Gamers Can Increase Their Skills Through Exercise
entries.description: A new documentary by Asics called 'Mind Games' backs up the age-old claim that a healthy body leads to a healthy mind. Especially when it now comes to the world of video games.

entries.title: AEHRA Aims To Revolutionize Car Design For The Electric Era
entries.description: Electric cars don’t have a big engine at the front, so why design them around internal combustion? AEHRA is rethinking the auto for the electrified era.

entries.title: Apple iOS 16.3: iPhone Update With A Crucial Feature You Need Is Nearly Here
entries.description: Just a matter of days until the next big update for iPhones is released, and is timed with Black History Month. Which is much sooner than anyone expected.

entries.title: Separating Wi-Fi Security Fact From Fiction
entries.description: The number of appliances, devices, and gadgets that connect via Wi-Fi continues to rapidly expand, while Wi-Fi networks and Wi-Fi connectivity has become essentially ubiquitous.

entries.title: Teaching In The Age Of Artificial Intelligence And ChatGPT
entries.description: ChatGPT provides a potentially enormous opportunity for business educators. However, these same technologies pose similarly enormous challenges for teachers.

entries.title: Study: Viagra, Cialis Users 25% Less Likely To Suffer Early Death, Here Are Caveats
entries.description: Those taking such erectile dysfunction medications also had a 17% lower incidence of heart failure, a 15% lower incidence of getting a coronary revascularization procedure, a 22% lower incidence of unstable angina, and a 39% lower incidence of death from cardiovascular causes.

entries.title: Today’s Wordle #581 Hint, Clues And Answer, Saturday January 21st
entries.description: How to solve today's Wordle.

entries.title: UnifabriX Uses CXL To Improve HPC Performance
entries.description: The UnifabriX memory node, utilizing the company’s Resource Processing Unit, provides a path to overcome direct connect DRAM bandwidth limitations in HPC applications using shared CXL memory.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Saturday, January 21
entries.description: Here's today's 'Heardle' song, along with some hints.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Saturday, January 21
entries.description: Some hints and the solution for today's 'Quordle' are just ahead.

entries.title: The Most Distant Stars In Our Galaxy Are Halfway To Andromeda, Say Scientists
entries.description: Astronomers have discovered stars a whopping one million light years from Earth, almost half the distance to our neighboring galaxy, Andromeda, which is about 2.5 million light years away.

entries.title: What To Stream This Weekend On Netflix, HBO, Peacock, Amazon Prime And More
entries.description: All the new movies and TV shows streaming this weekend.
